subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Appeals Courts (US)
organizations: Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit
lead_paragraph: Detroit Pistons guard Allen Iverson must pay $260,000 for standing idly by and watching his bodyguard beat up another man in a 2005 bar fight, a federal appeals court ruled. The Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit rejected Iverson’s attempt to throw out the verdict decided by a jury in 2007.
